dcterms:creator: Dave Epstein
Boyuan Chen
Carl Vondrick
dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of fail videos of unintentional action, often filmed by amateurs in diverse environments, containing a lot of camera jitter and motion blur, making tracking and segmentation challenging.
dcterms:title: Point-VOS Oops (PV-Oops)

dcterms:creator: Will Kay
Joao Carreira

Brian Zhang

Sudheendra Vijayanarasimhan
Fabio Viola
Tim Green
Trevor Back
Paul Natsev
dcterms:description: A large-scale action recognition dataset with 650K videos that cover 700 action classes, annotated with action labels.
dcterms:title: Point-VOS Kinetics (PV-Kinetics)

dcterms:creator: F. Perazzi
J. Pont-Tuset
B. McWilliams
L. Van Gool
M. Gross
A. Sorkine-Hornung
dcterms:description: A benchmark dataset and evaluation methodology for video object segmentation, consisting of densely annotated video sequences.
dcterms:title: DAVIS

dcterms:creator: Ning Xu
Linjie Yang
Yuchen Fan
Dingcheng Yue
Yuchen Liang
Jianchao Yang
Thomas Huang
dcterms:description: A large-scale video object segmentation benchmark that provides a comprehensive dataset for evaluating VOS methods.
dcterms:title: YouTube-VOS (YT-VOS)
